title: Agarwood Like a Dream
overview: To clear her late mother's name, the genius perfumer Ying Hemeng marries into her enemy's house, and becomes the concubine of the heir, Ye Buhuan. The two of them, each with their own agenda, have several confrontations and gradually develop feelings in the midst of their probing and scheming. Together, amidst a mixture of love and hatred, they unravel the truth of the past together.
